title: Remakes
body: After two consecutive games of a play immediately DC'ing a minute into the game, I thought it might be a good idea to extend the remake qualifications to allow a remake if a play disconnects within the time frame a failure to connect would allow a remake. The outcome on a team's chances is effectively the same, and it would save time for players who are then forced into the unenviable of playing 4v5.

replies.body: Our devs are open to remake adjustments and feedback, but be sure to let your voice be heard on the [Gameplay](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) boards.  In the meantime, your best bet is to resolve whatever is causing you to disconnect, and use custom games to test without penalty.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help rule out possibilities like network instablity while reaching the game server.  I hope that helps!
